worksInsideData.title: Focus Friend

Tracks behavior and suggests leisure activities.
Developed with Flutter, Bloc, Firebase, and clean architecture.

worksInsideData.title: Pokemon Statistics

features.description: Explores detailed Pokemon statistics with style.

worksInsideData.title: Cuerpo Fit - Entrena Conmigo
